alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Kershaw; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:26PM EST until January 09 at 4:15PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Western Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... Central Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 415 PM EST. * At 325 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Buford to Camden, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Camden, Lake Wateree Dam, Pageland, Kershaw, Heath Springs, Westville, Cassatt, Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, Mt Pisgah, Buford, Mcbee, Jefferson, Ruby, Bethune, Mount Croghan, North Central High School, Midway Elementary School, Pine Grove Fire Station, Central High School, and High Point Fire Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central South Carolina.
